Text: PVRC Workshoppst PVRCS WORKSHOP ON TIGHTNESSBASED BOLTED FLANGE GASKET CONSTANTS AND DESIGN RULES February Safety Harbor Florida REGISTER NOW AND WATCH FOR FUTURE ANNOUNCEMENTS ON PVRCS WEBSITE AT WWWFORENGINEERSORG Description You must attend this workshop to help keep your job knowledge useful by understanding the new design rules for bolted flanged joints Are you ready for the New TightnessBased Gasket constants and flange design changes that are about to replace the traditional constants and rules This workshop will get you ready with focus on three critical areas that apply to both ASME Section VIII flanges and standard B Joints The New TightnessBased Rules Gasket Qualification and Selection Latest On Analysis and Assembly of Bolted Joints This TwoDay Workshop is a must for those needing advance information and knowhow about applying the recently developed gasket constants and flange design rules The tightnessbased rules accommodate levels of permissible joint leakage representing a new basis for design criteria and opening additional choices and decisions for users and designers Attendees will gain detailed knowledge about several topics focussing on the new gasket constants and design rules and particularly on issues relating to leakage criteria and associated choices The tightness concept is also extended to elevated temperature gasket qualification and selection and knowhow for efficient joint assembly and making zero leakage plant operation a realistic goal is presented Several industry experts will lead workshop sessions including Bob Mikitka Jim Payne Michel Derenne Yves Birembaut Ron winter Jerry Waterland Rod Mueller Anita Bausman Jim Frew Hildegarde Zeres Warren Brown Ed Hayman Bill Koves and David Reeves Attendees will receive a bound collection of the presentations and guidelines and recommendations For additional information contact Welding Research Council at or wwwforengineersorgpvrc Register Now SEE NEXT PAGE Day Wednesday February Pick up Workshop Materials at AM AM SESSION am Opening Introduction and Overview TightnessBased Rules Why and How Derivation of New Constants ROTT Test New European Calculation EN Comparison of New and Traditional Rules including B Flanges and the New Rules Elevated Temperature Gasket Tests PM SESSION PM Elevated Temperature Gasket Tests continued CEN Tests Supporting EN Gasket Selection Considerations Test Protocol Guidelines for Gaskets Graphite Gasket Qualification PTFE Gasket Qualification Gasket Specification Considerations The ASTM Process Plant Gaskets NETWORKING TIME RECEPTION Day Thursday February AM SESSION Finite Element Analysis Guidelines External Loads on Joints Thermal Loading in joints Spiral Wound Gasket Buckling Bolted Joint Assembly P M SESSION ZeroLeakage Operations of HX in a Large Refinery Gasket Selection and Considerations for a Large Chemical Complex PANEL Future Trends and Current Needs Closure and Adjourn Workshop REGISTRATION FORM New TightnessBased Bolted Flange Gasket Constants and Design Rules February Safety Harbor Resort Spa Safety Harbor Florida on Tampa Bay N Bayshore Drive wwwsafetyharborspacom Hotel Reservations Phone Fax
